<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 975 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Niyaháat](/Armor.aspx?ID=31)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

This _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [fire-resistant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=283) [niyaháat](/Armor.aspx?ID=31)_ is often created to mark the passage of an Erutaki warrior into adulthood, formed from the chitinous plates of a remorhaz, with larger pieces protecting the chest, shoulders, and head. As you fight, the armor glows red hot.

<document level="2" id="action-1548" />

<document level="2" id="action-1549" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the carapace of a [remorhaz](/Monsters.aspx?ID=351).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
